img.alt: Two satellites connected by a string revolve in concentric circular orbits

problem.p: Two satellites of equal masses \(m\) revolve around the planet of mass \(M\) (M>>m). The radii of the orbits of the satellites are \(r\) and \(2r\). The satellites are connected by a light string, directed along the radius of the orbit, that keeps their periods of revolution equal. Find the force of tension in the string.
